ModuleDescription: Drude model of metal conduction; basic quantum mechanics; wave equations; quantum confinement; Bloch theory and periodic potential in solid; energy band structure; effective mass; Fermi Dirac statistics; Sommerfeld model of metallic conduction; semiconduct or: intrinsic, extrinsic, doping and conductivity; Boltzmann statistics; energy band structure; pn junction; selected examples of current devices and applications
Prerequisite: MLE1001 or MLE1002 or MLE1101 or MLE2101 or MLE1111
